评论详情: Bought this for my son’s girlfriend and she loved it!

This necklace is delicate and absolutely stunning! I love it so much! It's a bit on the expensive side, but so far the quality seems worth it. It also has a little bit of weight to it, which I appreciate. It goes with almost everything, and I get so many compliments when I wear it.

I ordered this necklace not knowing what to expect. It is beautiful and exudes understated elegance. This can be dressed up or down. So far I've only worn it a couple times so I cannot speak to its durability, BUT I expect it will last quite a bit. The gold is lovely and looks like 14k. I love this!
Me encantó!! Yo he comprado accesorios de esta marca antes, y son de excelente calidad! Muy simples pero se hacen notar🥰

This is a BEAUTIFUL easy to wear statement piece! so luxury grade in make and design, tarnish free, dainty yet still catches eyes, adjustable in size, affordable in price, gift friendly, and I ABSOLUTELY recommend this gorgeous necklace ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

评论概述: As pictured. Gold patina is spot on and not orange or brassy
评论详情: As pictured. Gold patina is spot on and not orange or brassy.  Great gift for any gold lovers.  Adjustable clasps is helpful.
This is a very cute and nice necklace. It has a good weight to it and has great shine!

I so love this gold hearts necklace, it's super cute and dainty, definitely a statement piece of jewelry. I can dress it up or down, I can layer it, or wear it along. A perfect piece to wear on Valentine's Day, makes a nice gift to give or receive. The quality is excellent, it's well made, lightweight, and perfect for everyday wear.

It is a nice necklace, no doubt. it can be worn at two different lengths (in the picture is the shortest). The color is pale gold, and under the light in some cases looks almost silver. It would be a nice gift, especially for Valentine's day, but in my opinion for the quality and look of the necklace, it is quite overpriced.
Absolutely love the hearts - very adorable. I wear mine every day with other chains. It looks terrific nice accent piece.

评论概述: Stands out but is so simple!
评论详情: This has a few different options for length, it sits nicely right around the collar bone area and can be seen with most shirt. I am not even a gold person but I knew I needed it the second I saw it. The quality is there and so is the look.
Such a good quality necklace. It’s the best size and super light. I have very sensitive skin and this beautiful necklace does not bother me.

The necklace is so pretty and is very light weight, super sparkly and the hearts fall well. You can dress it up and dress it down, goes really well with layering or by itself. It does not seem to tarnish but have not worn enough times to check on that.

I am in love with this necklace. It’s so dainty and cute. The quality is really good. It’s just costume, but very solidly made. The links are soldered closed, and the chain feels sturdy. The lobster clasp is very small, and the extender allows you to wear it at three different lengths. The hearts seem to want to flip upside down and back as I move, and this happens no matter what length I wear it. Doesn’t bother me, just something to note. It helps to make sure the chain is straight before putting it on. It’s  very cute layered with other necklaces. I really like it and will wear it a lot. Would make a nice gift for anyone who likes dainty jewelry, hearts, or for Valentines Day.

Very dainty and cute necklace, I love it!  However, the hearts are attached in such a manner that they flip upside down a lot (they can't swivel) so it doesn't lie very well.  Makes it look a little cheap.  But really sweet necklace otherwise.

评论概述: Beautiful necklace. Love the dainty style and comfort.
评论详情: This is my second piece of jewelry from 'Ana Luisa', and I'm quite pleased with this necklace so far. The style of the necklace is very pretty, and made in a dainty (yet durable) fashion. I love that it's lightweight, and is easy to put on or take off; has an easy-to-use clasp, in which is designed differently than other necklaces I've seen. This necklace would be a perfect gift idea, as it is presented nicely in a gift box already.  I love the look of this particular necklace, as it's a lovely chain, with tiny hearts along the front; this makes it a fantastic necklace to layer other necklaces with-or wear alone. I feel like the color of the gold is nice, and not too flashy; it really does look like a luxury piece of jewelry.  So far, I'm quite happy with this necklace, and I love the way it looks on me. It's the perfect length (for me), hanging just beneath my collarbone. I like that this brand uses some sustainable materials and practices, as well as being hypoallergenic too.  The price of this is a bit more than I'd typically be willing spend on a necklace; however, I love the chic style, durability, and the brand (as well as their sustainability). At this point, I'm rating this necklace at 4 stars; this may change, depending on how well this necklace holds up over time. So far, I'm quite happy with the look and design of this lovely piece of 'Ana Luisa' jewelry! ❤️

Ana Luisa is a name I've seen before and this necklace does not disappoint. It's a beautiful, dainty gold chain with little heart in a satellite pattern. It's 14k plated but the gold looks actually gold and not a burnt yellow like some plated pieces do. The chain is a little shorter than I normally like at 15.75" with an extender. It can be worn everyday and hasn't snagged in my hair or clothing. Definitely would recommend and it would make an excellent gift.

I am a HUGE fan of Ana Luisa jewelry and this is probably one of my favorite pieces from them.  This is a dainty flower and heart necklace that sits perfectly on my neck.  It wears very well with everyday clothing or you can dress up.  The quality, as usual, is great.  The cost is well worth it.  5/5

This is a gorgeous, cute, and dainty necklace. The hearts are tiny and really cute, going well with almost anything else you want to layer it with (or wear on its own!). It's super dainty, almost to a fault, and has a very thin chain holding it together. The gold color is pretty and doesn't look out of place with my actual gold jewelry. I have been wearing it consistently for about a week - I've worn it to the gym, showered, and slept in it and it doesn't show any signs of tarnishing or wear, which I really really appreciate as I HATE having to remove jewelry.  The chain is really thin and has a lobster claw clasp - but one of those that's really easy to work with on your own without asking for help - another thing I super appreciate. The length is cute but I DO wish there were more than three options for chain length.

I like the design of this necklace a lot. It's a perfect accessory that doesn't stand out all that much but rather complements and adds to a look. There are three larger loops on the chain for the lobster clasp to clip to at three different lengths. Nothing too long, though, since this necklace design is better suited to a short chain length. I've never purchased a necklace at this price point, though, and while it does seem to be of good quality, normally I would look for one that gives the look I want at a lower cost. But if you like to treat yourself a little more than I do, this is absolutely worth it, and it would make a great gift for people who like to wear dainty gold accessories.

The box it comes in is cute and giftable, but it's not a fancy velvet one or anything. I love that it's gold plated. Truly gold plated/hypoallergenic pieces can be difficult to find and this brand seems reputable - and prices accordingly. The little hearts are very dainty and there are a few different options for where to clasp it depending on how long you'd like it to be.
Delicate and dainty.  Fine details.  A well received gift for the holidays.
The necklace is a perfect length. Amazing quality
As always Ana Luisa jewelry never disappoints! this necklace is beautiful, elegant, simple, and the quality is top-notch.
I love to stack my necklaces and this one adds a little more style with my other more plain necklaces. It is shiny too.
The piece is smooth and elegant. But can be everyday wear. Comfortable on skin, doesn’t snag hair or twirl to much, clasp stays in the back

This necklace is so elegant. The links are dainty yet substantial enough to make an impact. The length is shorter to start but has some adjustment at the clasp to add to it.  I have several prices of Ana Luisa jewelry now and what I can say about it is that it is consistent in the color. Yes, you are paying for the brand but if you start to become a brand loyalist you will find that layering jewelry becomes a lot easier. I know that all of my Ana Luisa pieces are going to look amazing together because the gold is all the same shade. I love that ... I was looking at two bracelets that I layered recently that I thought were fairly similar at home and went I got to better lighting, I was way off. This is not something I have to worry about with any of my Ana Luisa pieces. This necklace is the perfect for layering with other necklaces, or wonderful stand alone for a super simple elegant look.  I love this necklace for its simplicity yet uniqueness. I really like the individual links vs a traditional chain. I wear it often and don't plan on stopping any time soon

So far I have only worn this necklace on its own and not layered. It is an attractive piece with lux appearance. It also seems durable. It is reassuring that the company offers a 2-year warranty so I expect the chain to retain its shine and pretty gold color for a while. Mind you, I would not shower or swim with it.

This is 14k over brass, currently selling for $65 less 20% coupon (at time of review). I legitimately do not begin to know what to tell you if you think you're getting solid gold at this price.  The plate color is excellent. Plated pieces are very frequently trying too hard, which is to say they're too mustardy or too orangey in color. This actually matches real, solid gold pieces. There will, of course, be some variation in solid gold based on kt percentage, but that orange nonsense screams fake.  The length on this is 15.75, 16.75, or 17.75 inches, as in the extender is a chain with loops at specific spots, not an all-loop extender. The actual measurements are between .75 and the next number up, but not close enough to call it 16/17/18.  This does indeed come in a box, without the little pouch they usually provide.  I generally don't mind the prices from this company because of their use of recycled materials and commitment to nonexploitative practices. That costs extra, and it's well worth it.

This necklace actually surprised me. It was thicker than I expected, but it’s design is different than other necklaces that I’ve seen. It looks more solid and durable. It is a really good length and the color gold looks more realistic.

This necklace is cute, it's about a bit longer than a chocker, perhaps 16 to 18 inches but lays nicely on your breastplate and layers very well with other pieces. It's a fine jewelry, a refined look and so far I've used perfumes and had had no issues with tarnishing and I spray a lot. It's a cute buy.

This is a delicate and beautiful gold necklace, perfect for everyday wear. The quality is exceptional, and I love that it’s hypoallergenic and water-resistant, making it both stylish and practical. The chain's elegance really stands out, and it arrived in beautiful packaging, making it an excellent gift option.

评论概述: Ana Luisa Jewelry Chain Necklace - Love this cute everyday chain.
评论详情: All the stars. This one comes in cute packaging that makes it great for giving - to myself :-). JK. It would e great to give to family or friends or anyone you want. The chain is perfect for everyday wear because it doesn't tangle in my hair or leave marks on my skin. It's comfortable and doesn't irritate. It looks fantastic and goes with everything. Beautiful lustre. Highly recommend.
This necklace is gorgeous. Perfect length and weight. I love the detail of this and it’s the perfect size.

Chain is pretty short so I bothered to measure it. It's only 18" if you include the extenders. 16" without. Could've used more clarity on this. It's otherwise a very pretty chain and the extenders seem a little higher quality than average.

This gold-plated necklace is over-priced for what it is. Up close and personal, the gold-plating looks cheap and fake to me. It's well-made, no obvious blemishes or flaws, but it seems way over-priced for a piece of costume jewelry that isn't solid 14k gold. Maybe it's a subjective thing, but this necklace isn't that impressive.

I ordered this necklace for my wife and she likes it . a timeless addition to your everyday stack. The classic design and polished finish is perfect for putting the finishing touch on any day or night look, no matter the occasion. hypoallergenic, water, and tarnish-resistant. Our unique and extra protective gold coating, along with extensive quality and control protocols, guarantee long-lasting radiance. a simple ball chain design that fits seamlessly into your everyday stack.

This is another ana luisa necklace I really like that feels great quality- nice tone of gold- is very pretty- and goes with any outfit. The ball chain design looks stylish and feels smooth/comfortable on skin. Would recommend if you like the style.

评论概述: Lovely Gold-Plated Chain for Everyday Wear and Layering
评论详情: I was looking for a dainty gold necklace to add to my layering collection, and this one from Ana Luisa stood out. This ball chain style is classic and reminds me a lot of some enewton pieces, which I love for their simplicity and elegance.  The 18-inch length is perfect, falling just below my collarbone, but I love that it has two adjustments in the back to wear it a bit tighter when needed. It layers beautifully with my other necklaces without feeling bulky, and the gold finish is subtle. It has the look of a real gold chain but is very light.  One thing I appreciate with Ana Luisa is the 2-year peace of mind guarantee, which gives me a lot of confidence in wearing it daily, knowing it’s protected against breakage or tarnishing.  The only downside was the packaging. Ana Luisa usually delivers their pieces in cute canvas satchels, but this time it arrived in a basic cardboard box, which felt like a bit of a letdown. Also, the chain is a bit lighter than I expected, but overall, it’s a beautiful, affordable piece that will probably become a staple in my jewelry rotation.

评论概述: Stunning necklace, looks like a genuine 14k chain
评论详情: This necklace is beautiful and I love the beaded/box chain design, it's modern and elegant. Goes well with any pendant fancy or classic. If you don't volunteer, no one will know that it isn't 14k, the color looks just like it and the weight is about right. Very, very nice.
This looks "real" which I always think is the best compliment you can give costume jewelry. Seems well made and has not tarnished. I love how it looks and it gives me a fun way to accessorize.

评论概述: Wish it was a little longer, but very pretty
评论详情: This Ana Luisa Jewelry Chain Necklace has a beautiful gold finish to looks like real gold chain, although the chain feels lightweight.  The chain is 18" long, including a 2" extender section that is made from gold links.  Perhaps I have a larger neck than other women, but this chain sits higher up near my neckline rather than down on my collarbone as pictured on the model.  I wish this was 18" of chain, with an additional 2" of extender. I do like the uniqueness of the necklace - the style is different enough to stand alone and it looks good layered with other chains.

评论概述: Stunning layering piece! 18 inches and adjustable!
评论详情: This is a gorgeous chain—totally exceeded my expectations! If you're into layering dainty gold jewelry, this is a fun mid-range length chain that falls just below the collarbone. It's about 18 inches long, but does allow for two adjustments in the back if you want to tighten it up. I love that it adds a bit of texture with the bubbles. The color is a beautiful light yellow gold. And the clasp is super easy to attach. So easy to wear! Definitely recommend!
Excelente para regalos

It is super lightweight and pretty but the feel of it seems a little cheap. It has held up so far but more of an FYI for when you first open the package. I think it cna be used for daily wear or also as a piece for a dressier outfit, a versatile piece!
This is a great looking chain.  It is strong and the gold doesnt turn

Ana Luisa Jewelry Chain Necklace is a pretty find. It arrived on time and as expected per the listing details. It was securely packaged in a small Ana Luisa box. The necklace is lightweight, smooth, and comfortable to wear. I am new to this company's jewelry but am glad to find a brand that offers a 2 year peace of mind for purchases. Additional aspects I like include that their products are made with sustainable practices and this necklace is made to be tarnish and water resistant. It's a nice and different addition to my jewelry options so mixing and matching pieces with it will be fun :)
Sturdy. Quality material. No change of color.light weight. Easy to put on and take off. Great value for your money.

I like this necklace, it is pretty and well made.  The clasp is secure and fairly easy to operate.  It is 18 inches, just barely and including the extra extension.  I am an average size woman, of normal weight.  On the model, who, to be fair, is Asian and probably more slightly built than me but the photo shows this necklace reaching below her collar bone by a half inch or more.  I was expecting this to reach just at or slightly above my collar bone and it is at least a half inch higher which is shorter than I would prefer.  Due to this issue I rated this necklace 4 instead of 5 stars.

This is great for daily wear. It’s not quite a statement necklace but is different enough to stand out. This is hypoallergenic and water resistant so I have been sleeping in it and wearing it in the shower with great success.

I generally love jewelry from this brand but this necklace was disappointing. The packaging was different from the cute canvas satchels they usually use. Just a cardboard box. The necklace seems of poorer quality than I’ve come to expect from this brand too. It’s pretty lightweight and a rather light yellowish gold color. Very pale.  I’d expect more for this price.
High quality gold necklace.  Really pretty design but it will need an extender in order to not choke me.

I like this necklace so much! I thought it might be kind of boring, but it honestly is so cute! It's very shiny in person, and the style is great. The length is good, kind of medium. It instantly adds a little shine to any outfit, and the basic chain style makes it great for layering. The ball chain style is a little different, but I like it! I love Ana Luisa for their simple but great gold pieces, this is no exception! Love it! It was easy to secure the hook and never felt heavy throughout the day.
Even though it's very thin, it's elegantly beautiful when worn with other gold necklaces.

评论概述: A Review of the Ana Luisa Rowena Necklace
评论详情: The Ana Luisa Rowena Necklace is a beautiful and unique piece of jewelry. The delicate gold chain and floral design are both dainty and eye-catching. The necklace is well-made and durable, and the 2-year coverage gives me peace of mind knowing that my investment is protected.  I love that Ana Luisa is committed to sustainable practices and uses recycled materials in their jewelry. It's great to know that I can look stylish while also making a positive impact on the environment.  Overall, I'm very happy with the Rowena necklace and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a beautiful and unique piece of jewelry.

Ana Luisa is an excellent brand. Here's another amazing piece from them. It's gorgeous; It's very easy to layer with other necklaces or wear by itself. It's also incredibly versatile, as it can be worn casually or formally. It could become a staple everyday piece, It has for me. I've gotten compliments on it and wear it frequently. Ana Luisa has amazing stuff, so rest assured this is high quality.

I absolutely love this necklace! It looks very nice and sits just below the neckline. I have worn this for days without end, in the shower and to sleep and this has not had any adverse affects. Overall, a beautiful necklace!
Cute and dainty! Looks nice , very good for the price
This is a beautiful necklace. It's dainty, and really looks stylish. I think it looks way more expensive than it is. It would definitely be a hit as a gift for any gold jewelry lover.

At first I felt this necklace was a little too pricey, however, when I learned that they offer a 2 year warranty I can now understand why. This necklace arrived quickly and was packaged securely inside of a nice jewelry box. It also included their signature canvas bag that has a magnetic closure and a cleaning cloth. I love how dainty and feminine this necklace is. It looks beautiful when wearing alone but also looks nice when layering with other jewelry. This necklace is plated in 14k gold and safe for sensitive skin. I’ve worn jewelry from this company many times now as someone with sensitive skin and have never had any sort of bad reaction. I’m very happy with the quality and appearance of this necklace, definitely recommend.
Especially for the price, this is a great necklace. It's very feminine and is adjustable. It's beautiful and I would definitely buy it again.

I love gold jewelry, and was in need of a new necklace, so I was so excited to get this one!  Another great product from Ana Luisa. They really make excellent quality jewelry and this necklace is just adorable. It goes great with any outfit, is very dainty and feminine and can be worn at various lengths, like a choker or a regular necklace. I also love the canvas case it comes in. It makes it easy to store, is sustainable, and looks very sleek in the drawer.  Big fan!

The necklace feels nice. It is dainty and design is elegant. The flowers are cute. This is for my daughter and she will be wearing it to her graduation. The clasps seems standard so I think this piece will last her a long time.

This necklace is a shorter length and adjustable. It is cute on its own and really love it layered with a longer necklace too. The flowers have little holes as the middles. Nice quality and I will continue to purchase this brand.

The necklace is beautiful.  It comes with a pouch which is gorgeous and the necklace is adjustable.  The little dainty flowers are so nice that you can wear it everyday.  It’s lightweight and the gold is nice and muted.  This is a great brand that I even got the bracelet to match.

评论概述: Lovely and Dainty Gold Plated Necklace
评论详情: This is a lovely, delicate gold necklace with little flowers at intervals along the chain. It’s got a minimalistic look to it while still giving the appearance of luxury. The 14k plating is done well and, for now, looks great. The presentation was top notch making it ready to be given as a lovely gift. I knocked a star for value. I cannot really justify the steep price point since it’s plated 14k and so thin. It fits nicely around the neck and is comfy. I don’t think it’ll last for any significant period of time for two reasons, it’s so thin it’ll eventually break, and the plating always wears off eventually. Often times it happens sooner than later. Overall I can’t say I’d recommend this as it is just not a lasting investment.

评论概述: Elegant Versatility: Ana Luisa Rowena Flower Station Necklace Review
评论详情: As an Amazon Vine Reviewer, I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Ana Luisa Rowena Flower Station Necklace, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every way. This necklace is not only stunningly beautiful but also boasts exceptional quality and versatility that make it a standout piece in any jewelry collection.  Let's start with the design. The Rowena Flower Station Necklace features delicate flower stations along a 14K gold-plated chain, giving it a timeless and elegant look. The flowers are intricately crafted, adding a touch of femininity and charm to the necklace. The adjustable chain length allows for versatile styling, making it easy to layer with other necklaces or adjust to your desired length.  One of the standout features of this necklace is its hypoallergenic, water-resistant, and tarnish-free properties. As someone with sensitive skin, I appreciate that I can wear this necklace all day without worrying about any irritation. Additionally, the water-resistant and tarnish-free properties ensure that the necklace maintains its luster and shine even with daily wear, making it perfect for everyday use.  The build quality of the necklace is exceptional. The 14K gold plating is durable and long-lasting, and the craftsmanship is evident in every detail. The chain feels sturdy yet lightweight, making it comfortable to wear for extended periods.  My teenage daughter absolutely adores this necklace, and I can see why. Its versatility allows her to wear it with a casual outfit for a touch of elegance or dress it up for a special occasion. She particularly loves layering it with other necklaces to create unique and stylish looks.  Overall, I am extremely impressed with the Ana Luisa Rowena Flower Station Necklace. It's not often that you find a piece of jewelry that combines such beauty, quality, and versatility. Whether you're treating yourself or looking for the perfect gift for a loved one, this necklace is sure to delight. Highly recommended!

The Ana Luisa 14K Gold Plated over Brass Chain Necklace is Gorgeous!!!  This Fabulous dainty flower design chain has an adjustable chain length which I really like. It’s pretty, of great quality, well made, comfortable to wear, lightweight. It so delicate… I love it!!!! It comes in a pretty green color pouch.  I definitely recommend that you get it…

A cute and dainty necklace that is definitely more for thinner necks. I like that it can be worn every day if you choose without fear of tarnishing. Overall it's nice and could make a good gift. I'm just not that impressed with it. It may grow on me.

This is a dainty detailed beautiful necklace. I plan to make this my daily necklace. It's just a little something extra without being "EXTRA". Looks great with t-shirts, sundress, work outfit. Appropriate for any age. The clasp is secure and the length adjustable.

This is a high quality necklace with real gold. It fits my neck beautifully. It is high quality and durable. Even the locking mechanism is high quality. It looks and feels way more expensive than it is. Great value. High quality. 5 stars!

This necklace is so cute! I like that the flower pendants are small and simple shapes. I prefer more subtle jewelry, so I'm glad they don't scream FLOWERS! This necklace would look good with a sundress or a plain white t-shirt, it's very versatile. It's not very long so might not be comfortable to wear if you're a larger person with a wide neck, as it sits right on my collarbone. It would look good layered with another dainty gold necklace that's longer.
It's perhaps a little pricey considering the metal isn't anything, it's still cute. It comes in a really nice pouch that will be great for travel, and will hold a few pieces. Looks like the pictures.

I love love love this necklace! It’s just beautiful! I haven’t taken it off all week! The length is perfect (and adjustable), and the flowers are so understated yet just right. It is high quality and the clasp is sturdy.
Excellent quality

For reference, I ordered the pendant style of this item. The design of this necklace is very simple and cute. The chain is a basic design with petite little flowers spaced evenly apart. The whole product is dipped in 14k gold which is amazing because my sensitive skin does not seem to be bothered by it. The necklace is very short in length when the chain is linked on the innermost loop. Even when the necklace is linked on the outermost loop, it is a shorter strand than most of the other ones in my jewelry box. The necklace looks very beautiful on my neck. I believe the delicate floral design would make a wonderful gift for a young girl. The product comes in a nice little fabric pouch with magnetic buttons. I have now owned this necklace for a few months and I can say with confidence it is officially my favorite go-to accessory for my neck. It matches my gold hoop earrings so well and looks perfect. I am extremely happy with the feel and look of this one.

评论概述: you just can't go wrong with Ana Luisa
评论详情: Beautiful necklace, as expected from the other high quality jewelry that I've gotten from this company. Very dainty necklace with precious little flowers, high high quality look and feel.

This necklace is the perfect size to wear for daily use. The flowers on it are pretty small, but it's super cute! The length is on the small side, so if you have a thick neck, this might be uncomfortable for you to wear. At the longest length, it's just below my collarbone. I've only worn it for a few days now, but it still looks great after wearing it for hours each day. It would make a great necklace to layer with a longer one.

I had never heard of Ana Luisa prior to finding this piece, but I'm already very impressed. The packaging alone would have probably sold me with it's elegant green pouch with magnetic closures and the bright orange box. But the delicate gold and timeless design were the real winners. I love that it can be worn more as a choker or as a staple necklace. I don't wear many necklaces, but I already know this is one I'll be wearing on a regular basis just because it can go with almost anything. My pre-teen niece would be obsessed with this and our 14 year old babysitter complimented me on it the same day it arrived, which was a definite confidence booster! Definitely a "hit".
Beautiful necklace with a classy design.

What a lovely, lightweight necklace!  Nicely packaged in a recyclable box and fabric pouch with magnetic clasps. On the first hole the necklace is 16”. At the last hole it is 18”. I like the 18” length myself (see photo). I wanted a necklace that I can wear everyday; this is not overly fancy but isn’t a boring ol’ plain chain. It’s perfect.

The flower necklace is a simple elegant design. It is a versatile and dainty piece that you can wear separately or layer with other necklaces. The chain can be adjusted to four different lengths depending on the look you want. My wife says all four lengths work well with different outfits. The necklace is well made and the clasp is easy to hook. It looks really nice on and can be worn for any occasion. The bag it came in is perfect to keep it separate from other necklaces and you can find it quickly. Very nice dainty necklace.
